# Dragonmarked Weapon, Greater
## Overview
[[Transmutation Spells|Transmutation]]

**Level:** [[5th Level Artificer Spells|Artificer 5]], [[5th Level Cleric Spells|Cleric 5]], [[4th Level Paladin Spells|Paladin 4]], [[4th Level Ranger Spells|Ranger 4]], [[5th Level Sorcerer Spells|Sorcerer 5]], [[5th Level Wizard Spells|Wizard 5]]

**BoXM:** [[BoXM 9th-Level Cleric Spells List|Cleric 9]], [[BoXM 9th-Level Wizard Spells List|Wizard 9]]

**Casting Time:** 1 standard action

**Components:** V, S, Dr

**Range:** Touch

**Target:** Weapon touched

**Duration:** 1 minute/level

**Saving Throw:** Will negates (object, harmless)

**Spell Resistance:** No

**Source:** Dragonmarked (WotC), pg. 151

*You imbue the touched weapon with the power of your dragonmark, a ghostly likeness of which appears on the weapon’s surface.*

As *[[Dragonmarked Weapon (Spell)|dragonmarked weapon]]*, except that the weapon deals an extra 2d6 points of damage to any dragonmarked creature whose mark does not correspond to the caster’s dragonmarked house. In addition, the weapon’s hardness is doubled for the spell’s duration.

*Dragonmark:* Any greater true or aberrant dragonmark, or any Siberys dragonmark.
